AUTOTRIGGER.HINT: Automatically trigger this transition any time this scene is activated.
AUTOTRIGGER.LABEL: Automatically Trigger

BARS.HINT: Number of bars into which to split the screen.
BARS.LABEL: Number of Bars

ANIMATIONDELAY.HINT: Time, in milliseconds, to wait before beginning the animation.
ANIMATIONDELAY.LABEL: Animation Delay

ANIMATIONDURATION.HINT: Time, in milliseconds, that it should take for the slide-in animation to play.
ANIMATIONDURATION.LABEL: Animation Duration

BOTCOLOR.HINT: Coor to be used for bottom, tertiary color bar.
BOTCOLOR.LABEL: Bottom Color

FONT.HINT: Font to use for message text.
FONT.LABEL: Font

FONTSHADOW.HINT: Color for the shadow on the main message text.
FONTSHADOW.LABEL: Font Shadow Color

FONTSIZE.HINT: Size of the main message font.
FONTSIZE.LABEL: Font Size

MESSAGE.HINT: If unspecified, will display an actor's name.
MESSAGE.LABEL: Message

MIDCOLOR.HINT: Color to be used for middle, secondary color bar.
MIDCOLOR.LABEL: Middle Color

SUBCOLOR.HINT: Color of the secondary message text.
SUBCOLOR.LABEL: Subtext Color

SUBSHADOW.HINT: Color of the shadow for the secondary message text.
SUBSHADOW.LABEL: Subtext Shadow Color

SUBSIZE.HINT: Size of the secondary message font.
SUBSIZE.LABEL: Subtext Size

SUBTEXT.HINT: Text displayed below the main message.
SUBTEXT.LABEL: Subtext

TOPCOLOR.HINT: Color to be used for top, primary color bar.
TOPCOLOR.LABEL: Top Color

TARGET.HINT: Screen point or scene element on which to center this effect.
TARGET.LABEL: Target

CURRENTSCENE.LABEL: Drawing in {scene}
CURRENTSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on the mid point of a drawing in the current scene.

NEWSCENE.LABEL: Drawing in {scene}
NEWSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on a mid point of a drawing in the next scene.

DRAWING.LABEL: Drawing
DRAWING.SELECTHINT: Please select a drawing to use for the target of this effect.

CURRENTSCENE.LABEL: Journal Note in {scene}
CURRENTSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on the location of a journal note in the current scene.

NEWSCENE.LABEL: Journal Note in {scene}
NEWSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on the location of a journal note in the next scene.

NOTE.LABEL: Note
NOTE.SELECTHINT: Please select a journal note to use for the target of this effect.

POINT.HINT: A normalized point on the screen.  (0,0) is the top left, (1,1) is the top right.  (0.5,0.5) is the center.
POINT.LABEL: Screen Point

PROMPT.HINT: Prompt for the target of this effect at the start of the transition.
PROMPT.LABEL: Ask Before Transition

CURRENTSCENE.LABEL: Tile in {scene}
CURRENTSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on the mid point of a tile in the current scene.

NEWSCENE.LABEL: Tile in {scene}
NEWSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on the mid point of a tile in the next scene.

TILE.LABEL: Tile
TILE.SELECTHINT: Please select a tile to use for the target of this effect.

CURRENTSCENE.LABEL: Token in {scene}
CURRENTSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on the mid point of a token in the current scene.

NEWSCENE.LABEL: Token in {scene}
NEWSCENE.HINT: Center this effect on the mid point of a token in the next scene.

TOKEN.LABEL: Token
TOKEN.SELECTHINT: Please select a token to use for the target of this effect.

BACKGROUND.HINT: Background color or image to show behind this step
BACKGROUND.LABEL: Background

DUALSTYLE.HINT: This effect can be applied to the transition overlay, the new scene, or both.
DUALSTYLE.LABEL: Apply effect to

FONTSIZE.HINT: Size of the font, in pixels.
FONTSIZE.LABEL: Font Size

EASING.HINT: The easing function to use when animating this transition.
EASING.LABEL: Easing

EXPORT.HINT: Download a copy of this sequence as a .json file.
EXPORT.LABEL: Export Sequence

BURNSIZE.HINT: Size of the burn holes during transiton
BURNSIZE.LABEL: Burn Size

MAXSHIFT.HINT: Amount by which to shift the hue.  1 will wrap back around to the original hue.
MAXSHIFT.LABEL: Shift Amount

IMPORT.HINT: Import a transition sequence previously exported as a .json file.
IMPORT.LABEL: Import Sequence

FONTCOLOR.HINT: Color of the loading tip text.
FONTCOLOR.LABEL: Font Color

LOCATION.HINT: Section of the screen to display the loading tip.
LOCATION.LABEL: Screen Location

ROLLTABLE.HINT: RollTable from which to select message.
ROLLTABLE.LABEL: RollTable

SOURCETYPE.HINT: The source from the loading tip will come.
SOURCETYPE.LABEL: Source

ROLLTABLE.HINT: Select a random message from a RollTable.
ROLLTABLE.LABEL: RollTable

PREVIOUS.HINT: Repeat the step prior to this one.
PREVIOUS.LABEL: Previous

DELAY.HINT: Time to delay before reversing the previous effect.
DELAY.LABEL: Delay

AMOUNT.HINT: Amount by which to multiply overlay UVs.  1 = normal size, <1 = closer, >1 = further away.
AMOUNT.LABEL: Zoom Amount

CLAMPBOUNDS.HINT: Clamp the edges of the overlay texture to the edge of the screen when zooming out.
CLAMPBOUNDS.LABEL: Clamp Bounds

INNERRADIUS.HINT: Radius of a circle in the center of the screen that is not blurred.
INNERRADIUS.LABEL: Inner Radius

IMPORTCONFIRM.TITLE: Import Sequence
IMPORTCONFIRM.MESSAGE: Importing a sequence will overwrite the existing one, are you sure you want to do this?

CLEARSTEPS.TITLE: Clear Transition Sequence
CLEARSTEPS.MESSAGE: Are you sure you wish to remove all transition steps?

REMOVECONFIRM.CONTENT: Are you sure you wish to remove {name}?
REMOVECONFIRM.TITLE: Remove {name}

WARNINGS.PREPARETIMEOUT: One or more clients timed out waiting for a response.
WARNINGS.REMOVEOVERLAYDEPRECATION: The 'removeOverlay' function is deprecated, and will be removed in a future update.  Please use 'hideOverlay' instead.
WARNINGS.RESTOREOVERLAYDEPRECATION: The 'restoreOverlay' function is deprecated, and will be removed in a future update.  Please use 'showOverlay' instead.

ERRORS.EXECUTECALLEDPARALLEL: Do not call execute function when creating parallel transition chains.
ERRORS.EXECUTECALLEDREPEAT: Do not call execute function when creating repeated transition sequences
ERRORS.NEWERVERSION: Data appears to be from a newer version: {version}
ERRORS.NOBACKGROUNDPROVIDED: No background image or color provided.
ERRORS.NOCOVERELEMENT: Unable to locate transition cover facade
ERRORS.PREPARETIMEDOUT: Timed out waiting for users to signal they're ready to transition.
ERRORS.TRANSITIONTOSELF: Attempting to transition to the current scene.
ERRORS.UNABLETOMIGRATE: Unable to migrate data from {old} to {current}

ANGULARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A wipe that clears angled sections of the screen progressively closer to the center.
ANGULARWIPE.NAME: Angular Wipe

BARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A wipe that consists of a series of bars from alternating sides of the screen.
BARWIPE.NAME: Bar Wipe

BILINEARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Two linear wipes along a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal axis originating from either the center or outer edges of the screen.
BILINEARWIPE.NAME: Bilinear Wipe

BOSSSPLASH.DESCRIPTION: Trigger an animation from the Boss Splash Screen module.
BOSSSPLASH.NAME: Boss Splash Screen

CHROMAKEY.DESCRIPTION: Replace one color found in the current transition image with another.  Useful for adding transparency to green screen videos.
CHROMAKEY.NAME: Chroma Key

CLEAREFFECTS.DESCRIPTION: Remove any transition effects that have been applied to the overlay.
CLEAREFFECTS.NAME: Clear Effects

CLOCKWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Wipe the screen around the center point in either a clockwise or counterclockwise direction.
CLOCKWIPE.NAME: Clock Wipe

DIAMONDWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Break the screen into diamond shapes that shrink over time, starting from the left to the right.
DIAMONDWIPE.NAME: Diamond Wipe

FADE.DESCRIPTION: Fade from the current foreground to a specified background color.
FADE.NAME: Fade

FIREDISSOLVE.DESCRIPTION: Apply a burning effect to the screen, exposing the underlying background.
FIREDISSOLVE.NAME: Fire Dissolve (Burn)

FLASH.DESCRIPTION: Flashes the screen a given color or texture.
FLASH.NAME: Flash

HIDEOVERLAY.DESCRIPTION: Sets the transition overlay to invisible, exposing the new scene underneath.
HIDEOVERLAY.NAME: Hide Overlay

LINEARWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A linear wipe from one side of the screen to the other, exposing a given background color along the way.
LINEARWIPE.NAME: Linear Wipe

MACRO.DESCRIPTION: Execute a macro.  This will execute for each user with their own permissions, so please be sure they have permission at all.
MACRO.NAME: Macro

MELT.DESCRIPTION: Melt the screen like you may have seen in a certain demon-killing FPS.
MELT.NAME: Melt

PARALLEL.DESCRIPTION: Run multiple sequences of transition effects simultaneously.
PARALLEL.NAME: Parallel

PIXELATE.DESCRIPTION: Increase the displayed size of pixels in the overlay texture.
PIXELATE.NAME: Pixelate

RADIALWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Circular wipe, starting either from the inside or outside of the screen.
RADIALWIPE.NAME: Radial Wipe (Shutter)

REPEAT.DESCRIPTION: Repeat either the previous step or a specified sequence of steps.
REPEAT.NAME: Repeat

REVERSE.DESCRIPTION: Play the previous step in reverse, if available.
REVERSE.NAME: Reverse

SHOWOVERLAY.DESCRIPTION: Set the transition overlay to visible again.
SHOWOVERLAY.NAME: Show Overlay

SOUND.DESCRIPTION: Play a sound during the transition.  Unlike most transition steps, this one will NOT wait until the sound is finished to continue to the next.
SOUND.NAME: Play Sound

SPIRALSHUTTER.DESCRIPTION: A shutter-type wipe in a spiral shape.
SPIRALSHUTTER.NAME: Spiral Shutter

SPIRALWIPE.DESCRIPTION: A spiral-shaped screen wipe, starting from the outside or inside of the screen.
SPIRALWIPE.NAME: Spiral Wipe

SPOTLIGHTWIPE.DESCRIPTION: Bilinear wipe centered on a point along the edge of, and starting from either the inside or outside of the screen.
SPOTLIGHTWIPE.NAME: Spotlight Wipe

STARTPLAYLIST.DESCRIPTION: Start playing the new scene's configured ambient sound / playlist.
STARTPLAYLIST.NAME: Start Ambient Playlist

TEXTURESWAP.DESCRIPTION: Set the current transition background to a given image.
TEXTURESWAP.NAME: Texture Swap

WAIT.DESCRIPTION: Wait some specified amount of time.
WAIT.NAME: Wait

ZOOM.DESCRIPTION: Zoom in on some point on the screen.
ZOOM.NAME: Zoom

ZOOMBLUR.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously zoom in on and blur the screen.
ZOOMBLUR.NAME: Zoom & Blur
